name: @wedxml/core
description: Wed is a schema-aware editor for XML documents.
author: Louis-Dominique Dubeau <louisd@mangalamresearch.org>

scripts.tsc: npm run generate-ts && tsc -p src/tsconfig.json --outDir build/standalone/lib && tsc -p src/wed/cli/tsconfig.json --outDir build/standalone/lib
scripts.copy-web: mkdir -p build/standalone/lib && cp web/*.html build/standalone/ && cp web/*.js build/standalone/lib
scripts.copy-schemas: mkdir -p build/schemas && cp schemas/*.js build/schemas/ && (cd schemas; cp --parents `find . -name '*.rng'` ../build/schemas)
scripts.bin: mkdir -p build/bin && sed -e's;../build;..;g' bin/wed-metadata > build/bin/wed-metadata && chmod +x build/bin/wed-metadata
scripts.build-dev: npm run config && npm run copy-src && npm run bin && npm run copy-web && npm run yml-to-json && npm run tsc && npm run less && npm run copy-schemas && tasks/make-schema-metadata && tasks/make-samples && npm run generate-build-info && npm run build-bundled-doc && mkdir -p build/ajax
